name: Host — Indie Demo
description:
Thanks for checking this out, please give me feedback so I can improve. Art is not final...

Collect as much money as possible as fast as possible, without getting caught.
Download the host's data to gain money.
Upload a virus that takes more data, but continually increases your suspicion.

Mouse/Keyboard Controls:

Left Click: Enter connection host
Right Click: Begin connection jump
Left + Right: Select option within host
Right + Left: Connection jump
R: Reset on death

Controller Controls:

Left Trigger: Enter connection host
Right Trigger: Begin connection jump
Left + Right: Select option within host
Right + Left: Connection jump
A: Reset on death

Good luck figuring it out!
